hero.title: Accounting & Administrative Service Firms
hero.subtitle: Automate tax, payroll, and filings without sending data off-prem.
hero.intro: Firms run against strict deadlines for AEAT forms, payroll, and multi-agency filings. These tasks are repetitive, regulated, and error-prone when done manually. Sentra runs on-prem in your own infrastructure and automates the mechanical work so your team can focus on professional judgment. If an intern can do it, Sentra can too.

challenge1.title: Deadline spikes & official filings
challenge1.body: Monthly/quarterly closings (e.g., 303, 111, 130, 190) with uneven workload and zero tolerance for delays.

challenge2.title: Manual, fragmented workflows
challenge2.body: Collecting invoices/receipts, re-keying across Excel, ERP, and portals (AEAT/TGSS), and duplicating information.

challenge3.title: Errors, rework & confidentiality
challenge3.body: Copy-paste mistakes, late reviews, and strict data protection (GDPR) requirements.

solution1.title: Document ingestion & data extraction
solution1.body: Automatic capture of PDFs and e-invoices, OCR, normalization, and basic validation for review.

solution2.title: AEAT form pre-fill
solution2.body: Drafts for 303, 111, 130, 190 (and others) from extracted data, ready for review and submission.

solution3.title: Payroll assistant
solution3.body: Draft payroll calculations, bases, social security files; support for hires/terminations and exports.

solution4.title: Filings & letters
solution4.body: Generate letters and agency communications (AEAT, TGSS, SEPE) from internal templates with pre-filled fields.

solution5.title: Regulatory updates with impact
solution5.body: Summaries of relevant changes and client-level checklists to adapt processes without losing focus.

solution6.title: Traceability & quality control
solution6.body: Per-user logs, mandatory human review before submission, and granular permissions for audits.

security.title: Security & control
security.body: On-prem in your network: data never leaves your office unless explicitly configured. Encryption in transit and at rest, access control, and audit logs aligned with GDPR.
